name: Herbed Saucy Risotto
description: Make a mish-mash of crave-worthy flavours easily by pairing with seasoning and finishing sauce. Customize to create your own sensational risotto using the base recipe below.

ingredients.name: Arborio rice or other medium-grain rice

preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup, heat broth to a gentle simmer. Reduce heat and keep warm.
Heat a Multipurpose Pot - 12 cup to medium; add olive oil and rice. Toast rice for about 2 minutes before adding seasoning and water or wine. Stir well and cook until nearly all liquid evaporates.

Add one ladle of warm broth to rice, stir, and cook until stock is absorbed. Continue to add broth to rice 2–3 ladles at a time, stirring and cooking after each addition, until liquid is absorbed. This process can take 15–20 minutes. Stop adding liquid once rice is al dente or tender, yet still firm.
Remove rice from heat and drizzle with prepared finishing sauce. Serve.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 protein serving and 1⁄2 cup of veggies.
